bot_perm_need.title: {{emoji_error}} Error | I don't have enough Permissions!

Please give me just `ADMINISTRATOR`, because I need it to delete Messages, Create Channel and execute all Admin Commands.
 If you don't want to give me them, then those are the exact Permissions which I need: 
> `{{required_perms}}`
